trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Golden
There were no other sightings in Golden on or around January 12th 2013
Summary: Seems to be consistent with constellations with slight variations. Witnessed many times.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was stargazing through a pair of 20X stellar binoculars and noticed what looked like a structure or multiple craft. I've been watching these objects sense about October of 2011. What caught my attention was the changing colors of the main light and the changing configurations of the darker objects around it. I've taken many pictures of the objects over time. Please just zoom in on the attached photo and tell me what you think.
